cancelProposal(uint256).details: Only project can cancel their own pending proposals

executeProposal(uint256).details: Project can execute after DAO approval

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

submitProposal(address,uint256,string).details: Only project address can submit proposals

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

availableBalance(address).notice: Mapping of dataset token to available balance

depositFunds(address,address,uint256).notice: Deposits funds from IDO into treasury

executeProposal(uint256).notice: Executes an approved proposal and transfers funds

getTreasuryBalance(address).notice: Gets treasury balance for a dataset

projectAddresses(address).notice: Mapping of dataset token to project address

proposals(uint256).notice: Mapping of proposal ID to proposal details

setDAOGovernance(address).notice: Sets DAO Governance contract address (can only be set once)

setIDOContract(address).notice: Sets IDO contract address (can only be set once)

totalDeposited(address).notice: Mapping of dataset token to total deposited

totalWithdrawn(address).notice: Mapping of dataset token to total withdrawn
